title: Trouble logging onto new client
body: Not entirely sure why but I can't seem to log onto the new client. The password that I use works on the legacy client but won't go through with the new one. Is the LCU not in open beta yet for other regions?

replies.body: It is in fact not in open beta for NA![  Open Beta](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/udU4bGfj-experiencing-issues-with-the-updated-client-open-beta-we-got-you) is currently open to OCE right now.  We aim to have more regions go live, though!
wait jk i lied i forgot to change my server back to NA derp
